name: Sonora Software
overview:
Sonora Software delivers high quality software for mobile, desktop, web, or cloud based applications for clients in all professional domains. We specialize in low cost nearshore development of all types of business process software, portals, and tools to help clients improve business operations and optimize performance.

Specialties: Mobile Computing Software, Web Design and Development, Business Process Software, Cloud Application Development, Custom Software Development, Software Testing, Enterprise Data Integration and Management, Product Modeling and Prototype Development, Custom Tools
